title: Conditions where gravitational force is neglected

content.prompt: Under which of the following new conditions could the gravitational force on the object be neglected?

choices.label: q E ≫ m g MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B0F@

E h ≫ E w MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AEE@

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
